item.title: When you have too much to do
item.description: Life is Short …. There are only 24 hours in a day … Let’s get some small habits that we can play with . Read 16 min a day . that’s 2^4 min a day Things that take a short time ( 2 min) , do it right away Things that take 2^3 min ( 8 min) , note down and do it later Manage money coming in (income), Money going out (expense) Drink more water - 2^3 glasses a day Stand Up and work everyday , Get a table that adjusts Questions ?
